mapper.select: select num, writer, content, target_id, ref_group, comment_group, delete, board_cafe_comment.regdate, profile from board_cafe_comment inner join users on board_cafe_comment.writer=users.id where ref_group=#{ref_group}
mapper.insert: insert into board_cafe_comment (num, writer, content, target_id, ref_group, comment_group, regdate) values(#{num}, #{writer}, #{content}, #{target_id}, #{ref_group}, #{comment_group}, sysdate)
